articles.title: Virginia technology company to pay civil penalty over discriminatory ‘Whites only’ job posting, according to DOJ - CNN
articles.description: A Virginia company, Arthur Grand Technologies Inc., will pay a $7,500 civil penalty after being fined by the Department of Justice over a discriminatory job posting.
articles.content:
